title: Well.. Warframe was a bust. Can't get any support frame to play.
body:
Like I got the twitch prime bundle so I got the frost prime. Sure he's obviously broken as hell on defense missions but he isn't a support.

Like.

If I could get Oberon Prime or Trinity Prime or even Saryn (lots of poison is appealing) I could play.

But like... no support warframes for real?! I just can't enjoy the game and I know I am not willing to spend 40+ hours playing something I don't enjoy. I really truly only support... :/
